attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Its about time that we learn from the americans that having someone in office for too long is not a good thing for the country. from having a premier that is fresh and different turning into a premier that is stale and passed his sell by date.
We need constant change to keep the MPs in touch with the people, the good intentions they have when they start on the political road, changes when they are whipped into conformity by parliment. sign the petition to change the arrogance of people who lead our country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
